original_title: エロ怖い怪談 第弐之怪 ポルターガイスト
overview: A young woman is run over by a car because she's constantly staring at her phone. After a stay in a hospital it turns out that the accident has granted her extrasensory powers and enables her to see ghosts. Despite being told to ignore her new powers by an occultist, she proceeds to use her gift to help people with their ghost troubles.
title: Erotic Scary Stories Vol.2 - Poltergeist
